title: The Unbearable Lightness of Scones
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: Matthew was astonished that she did not remember, and was about to express his astonishment. They had gone out to Single Malt House and one of the Duke's sons had played the pipes and ...Wrong woman. It had been Pat, not Elspeth.
